data.title: Contact WKMG News 6
data.meta_description: Contact information for WKMG News 6 and ClickOrlando.
data.text:
At WKMG/ClickOrlando.com, we aim to Get Results!

Our No. 1 goal is to provide Central Florida communities with the information, resources and support they need. We do this by utilizing our core values: integrity, teamwork, innovation and passion.

We look forward to helping you, so please direct your submission to the proper department by using one of the buttons or the information below. Sharing as many details as possible will allow us to better help you.

Please visit the Results Desk if you have a question or want more information about WKMG/ClickOrlando.com.

Sales

Please email advertising@wkmg.com.

Front Desk

Please call 407-521-1200.

News Desk

Leave a news tip on the News 6 hotline at 407-445-1404, or contact the news desk at 407-521-1323.

ClickOrlando.com Deals

Click here to get help with a ClickOrlando.com Deal.

Mailing Address

WKMG-TV News 6

4466 N. John Young Parkway

Orlando, FL 32804

Directory

Connect with News 6 on Social Media

Follow @news6wkmg on X and like us on Facebook to keep up with the news of the day and interact with us.

We also maintain a list of News 6 social media accounts.
